title: The Red Leather Shoes feat. Madhur Jaffrey & Aasif Mandvi
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Aasif Mandvi (The Daily Show, Evil) and Madhur Jaffrey (Madhur Jaffrey's Curry Nation, I Feel Bad) co-star in this Indian story about a wise king, a generous shoemaker, and a priceless pair of shoes.
